name: Inn
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The inn has a warm, welcoming atmosphere with the scent of hearty food and the sound of travelers sharing stories. The air carries the promise of rest and the comfort of a home away from home, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of community and the exchange of news from distant lands.
